description: Refactor BillingDetail.tsx (930 LOC) into modular tab-based components

workstreams.description: Setup directory structure and extract shared code
Create individual tab components (Overview, Payments, Services, History, Documents)
Refactor main BillingDetail component to orchestrate tabs
Verify LOC limits and component integration

decisions.decision: Use BillingDetail/ subdirectory to contain all related components
Target max 300 LOC per tab component for maintainability
Extract shared types and utilities to separate files
